{"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#大场奈奈2020生诞祭#7月12日，这个日子对于喜欢少女歌剧、喜欢九九组的人而言，被赋予了越来越多的意义，仿佛像一条暗线，串起了少歌的成长史。\n而你本身也是那个不可缺失、否则故事将无法完整讲述的存在。\n但今天只想单纯祝福作为舞台少女不断前进的你：生日快乐，大场奈奈。[爱心]","id":81466218,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":590,"img_size":119.71,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/834150ed3d3d265cbdc9fcc1a3745c90002ef10f.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":786},{"img_height":840,"img_size":120,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/d37b7de9d5f02de4c8b68633d67d65f16ea1dab4.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1125},{"img_height":720,"img_size":122.17,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/1fb1501d412b0a69cdb9fa2311de6ede35501a2e.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":960},{"img_height":721,"img_size":153.42,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/8f2d65b0b28124a13364ceccdd72f21ece6d3422.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":960},{"img_height":675,"img_size":85.48,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/5ff93dda7957b10c581646d1931160724d5d8871.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":900},{"img_height":1110,"img_size":211.7,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/1f5cb4b3bb713734b601d48bbab737b09cda33cd.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":2000},{"img_height":281,"img_size":19.56,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/fdc127a6ea1d34537d3e4d82b802c48d2bc54d02.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":500},{"img_height":576,"img_size":31.42,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/66f1d06738a65bfe50fd1f418d3899a9d6ef09a1.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":576},{"img_height":720,"img_size":78.08,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/3f9b00ca18b2a375879ffcc21680ace0fa118150.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1280}],"pictures_count":9,"reply":128,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1594561510},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":15790176
